forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 19C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 69F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 70F. ESE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 18C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 67F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 56F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High around 65F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 53F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 66F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 65F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 56F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 66F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High near 65F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 11C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 15C. SE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 61F. SE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 53F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
